scripts.dev: (npx pm2 restart worker || npx pm2 start ./index.js --name worker --watch --ignore-watch='database/** node_modules tmp/** .git/**') && npx pm2 logs worker
scripts.start: (npx pm2 restart worker || npx pm2 start ./index.js --name worker --watch database) && npx pm2 logs worker
scripts.push:template: git checkout master && rm -rf database/* && git add . && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push origin master
